review: I LOVE my Fire Stick! It was very easy to set up and is very easy to use in general.
author: Adrianne S.

review: I love the Fire Stick! I bought the Chrome Cast and it was difficult to use, and was disappointed that Amazon Video was not available. Setup was very simple and the remote makes it very easy to navigate.
author: Jennifer J. Clark

review: So glad we got this.  We had Chromecast, but this allows us to watch everything we did with Chromecast plus Amazon prime movies.  Love it!
author: Chelsea J Kinney "Ucsoftball24"

review: Not happy with the fact that the advertised picture doesn't show the entire product.The fact that a separate USB cable andA/C adapter are needed gave me no advantage over my Roku 3I had to snake new wires through my wall in order to keep the wireless look to my wall mounted tv
author: My man Shane!

review: Love it! However a lot of the movies on Prime Video (where you have to pay) can be obtained from Netflex on DVD (for free) if you subscribe to their service.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Unless you pay for Prime, there is basically no movies. And if you don't have a cable provider, you can't get Disney, Showtime, etc.
author: Joseph Miller

review: Overall we are pleased with the fire stick,but I like to look at Acorn tv and fire stick doesn't connect to them without extra payment.
author: Patricia L. Jensen "Patty Quilter"
